segments.text: I have a typical nine to five job . Actually , I work a little longer than nine to five most days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't . I get a bonus each month , depending on the value of the contracts I sign with clients .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have an hour-long lunch break from twelve to one . We can take coffee breaks during the day . My boss doesn't mind , as long as we get our work done on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My boss gets annoyed if we take coffee breaks . I suppose your job involves a lot of paperwork , doesn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's some paperwork , but most of the time we put the information into our computers . Then we can send information to each other by email or across the network . Do you work in a cubicle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . I don't like it very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I work in a cubicle too , but I don't mind it .
segments.speaker: S2
